title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah: Air Force Targets Operatives After Rocket Launches”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Documentation: After identifying the source of the fire, the IDF attacked a building in which two Hezbollah operatives suspected of carrying out the earlier fire towards Misgav Am were located.

Earlier today, several launches were identified from the Rab al-Tlathin area in Lebanon towards the Misgav Am area; air defense fighters successfully intercepted most of the launches.

Shortly after the launches, the forces of Division 91 identified two operatives entering a military building of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the vicinity of the fire source; fighter jets of the Air Force attacked the building containing the operatives.

Attached is documentation on the subject: https://bit.ly/3zI7pOS

Shortly after the launches, the forces of Division 91 identified two operatives entering a military building of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the vicinity of the fire source; fighter jets of the Air Force attacked the building containing the operatives.
